name: Confidential Layer
description: Confidential Layer is a decentralized, non-custodial bridge that connects public blockchains (such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, and others) with privacy-focused blockchains like Zano. It is designed to preserve user privacy and asset security while maintaining liquidity and interoperability across networks. As the main bridge of the Bridgeless ecosystem, it also facilitates bridging between different public blockchains (BTC â†” ETH).
